import'./AddCategory.css';import axios from'axios';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{_categoryapiurl}from'../../api_url';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";function AddCategory(){const[file,setFile]=useState();const[output,setOutput]=useState();const[catName,setCatName]=useState();const handleChange=event=>{setFile(event.target.files[0]);};const handleSubmit=()=>{//event.preventDefault();  //page refres ko rokne ke liye
var formData=new FormData();formData.append('catnm',catName);formData.append('caticon',file);const config={'content-type':'multipart/form-data'};axios.post(_categoryapiurl+"save",formData,config).then(response=>{setCatName("");setFile("");setOutput("Category Added Successfully....");});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"contact",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"container-xxl py-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"row g-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"col-lg-12 wow fadeInUp","data-wow-delay":"0.3s",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h1",{class:"mb-4 text-danger text-uppercase",children:["Add Category ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{class:"text-success",children:" Here!!!"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("font",{style:{"color":"blue"},children:output}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"catnm",children:"Category Name:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",class:"form-control",value:catName,onChange:e=>setCatName(e.target.value)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{class:"form-group",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{for:"file",children:"Category Icon:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"file",class:"form-control",onChange:handleChange})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSubmit,type:"button",class:"btn btn-danger",children:"Add Category"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"row gy-2 gx-4 mb-4"})]})})})})]})});}export default AddCategory;
